Observing the nearby elements, there are a mix of citizens (c), a box ($) at (4, 4), and interaction points related to salvation (@) at (1, 24). The goal is to manage transformations and avoid curses while trying to maximize score opportunities.

Since the avatar did not move and maintaining the current position doesn't progress the game, I will choose to move up to (5, 20) to see if there is a chance to interact with citizens and avoid potential curses.
